text:
@realDonaldTrump You’ve cost up to 38,600,000 Americans their jobs, all because you wanted to downplay the coronavirus threat. Also the death toll now stands over 100,000. we will not forget your FAILED response.
#WorstPresidentInHistory 
#RESIGN
#DumpTrump2020
#LiarInChief

#MurdererInChief https://t.co/xp7tb1tXSS

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
